DOC.brief_title: Physical Therapy Pregnant Women With Preeclampsia

Various form hypertensive disorder occur pregnancy , include preeclampsia chronic hypertension superimpose preeclampsia . These two disorder present high blood pressure proteinuria , often lead hospitalization pregnant woman . The objective evaluate effectiveness physical therapy protocol use pregnant woman preeclampsia blood pressure , maternal-fetal outcome perinatal outcome . Participants study pregnant woman preeclampsia hypertension superimpose pre-eclampsia , hospitalize , significant complication may impair normal course pregnancy . All pregnant woman monitor laboratory clinical data fetus monitor test assess vitality , addition , pregnant woman intervention group perform propose physiotherapeutic study protocol .
